posts.name: The /wg/ Bros
posts.com:
New to /wg/? Lets get you started.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
1) Look before you post
2) Post more than one, sharing is caring
3) We already have an Image Modification thread
~ ~ (ALL colorsplash, watermarks, photoshop requests)
4) We already have a Desktop thread
~ ~ (ALL desktops, rating, and theme/hax questions)
5) Share anything WP related!
~ ~ (NO low res/quality, illegal content;
~ ~ ~ anime goes in /w/, this is not /r/)

We on /wg/ love WPs and we love sharing them.
~ ~ ~ That's why we're here.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Now lets do it!

posts.name: The /wg/ Bros
posts.com:
Wallpaper Collections

Snowolf's WP Collection - 42,000+ WPs!
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

I've been collecting wallpapers for a while now and have over 42,000 in this collection. I've lowered my estimate to compensate for duplicates but you wouldn't expect me to collect over 42,000 wallpapers sober right?
This collection does not contain WallPaper Man's collection.
(although may contain some of the same images, also see duplicate image detector in second post)

thepiratebay.se/torrent/6979439/Snowy_s_Wallpapers

-This is for people who really just want the whole thing but you can choose single WP genere folders. TPB didn't like the hundreds of folders holding over 42,000 WPs so they're RAR'd into the major sections.

www.mediafire.com/?1353a5ah024zn

-This is my entire collection segmented for those who either can't P2P or would just prefer Mediafire. This will contain all the updates which will be logged in the Wallpaper Download Guide.txt


WallpaperMan Torrent
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6409959/Wallpaper_Man_s_Collection

Update
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6735161/WallpaperMan_s_Collection_Updated

Quite well appreciate his work which of course
inspired my efforts to make my collection.
